Description of VB.net Demos
---------------------------

Folder "viewer":
VB Demo program using VRmUsbCam .NET API v2 and GDI for Viewer,
with project for Visual Basic 2008

Folder "xmldeviceinfo":
VB Demo program using VRmUsbCam .NET API v2 which generates a xml file with infos of connected devices,
with project for Visual Basic 2008
